intro: Step into a stealth mission full of action and absurd comedy during the Cold War.
description:
Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star – Complete Edition is a stealth-action game that pays tribute to the classics of the genre, delivering a tactical infiltration experience with an over-the-top, absurdly comedic narrative.
Created by David Amado Fernández, this Complete Edition unites all three original episodes into one full adventure starring the legendary Valero Montenegro.
Set in the heart of the Cold War, you’ll face off against the Soviet army, uncover nuclear threats in Cuba, and track down a mysterious Japanese weapons engineer.
Use strategy, stealth, and a variety of tools to overcome obstacles in levels that evoke the nostalgia of old-school infiltration games.
Absurd cutscenes, unexpected twists, and pure stealth gameplay await in this indie love letter to tactical espionage.
